name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>44291825

“It wasn't my driving motivation. I thought I could distract him—in my defense, she's been in my head for a while, so I thought she was significant, being his lost love and all.” You sigh, maintaining self-control. “I didn't want it at the expense of the raid. I honestly thought I was making the right play.”

“Kainzo. You're not the boss of him.” Nel says, but his face doesn't quite match his words. “Whatever he did worked. He helped end the fight, and we're all alive.”

Kainzo simply shakes his head, checking his surroundings before putting his weapon away.

> [[ Local dangers are gone with the defeat of a Precursor. ]]

> [[ Inventory: Kjorikos ]]
A Precursor's Puzzle Box
case key
wrought iron deathmask (damaged, unidentified)
aetherbinder's cloak (damaged, unidentified)

> [[ Inventory: Velika ]]
decorated stola (unidentified)
jeweled sandals (unidentified)
godhead's brooch (unidentified)
traitorous kris (unidentified)
Celestial Gem (in godhead's brooch)

You check your inventory. Indeed, the empty picture frame is gone. That's a relief, at least.

“We'll sort all of this out once we're back downstairs, along with everything else we've come across today.” Kainzo says, holding the puzzle box between his fingertips. “Save for this, which I'm told belongs somewhere. Unless anyone's somehow opposed.”

> Return to Kjorikos's study.
> Write-in.
